00041 void test()
00042 {
00043     if (os_) *os_ << "**************************************************\ntest()\n";
00044 
00045     // create data with Lorentzian peak at 0, parabolic peak at 7.5 
00046     FrequencyData fd;
00047     for (int i=-5; i<=5; i++)
00048         fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(i, 3/sqrt(i*i+1.)));
00049     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(6, 1));
00050     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(7, 9));
00051     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(8, 9));
00052     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(9, 1));
00053 
00054     // create initial peak list
00055     vector<Peak> peaks(2);
00056     peaks[0].frequency = .1;
00057     peaks[1].frequency = 7.4; 
00058 
00059     // storage for results
00060 
00061     vector<Peak> estimatedPeaks;
00062 
00063     // run Parabola estimator
00064 
00065     auto_ptr<FrequencyEstimatorSimple> 
00066         fe(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::create(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::Parabola));
00067 
00068     for (vector<Peak>::const_iterator it=peaks.begin(); it!=peaks.end(); ++it)
00069         estimatedPeaks.push_back(fe->estimate(fd, *it));
00070 
00071     // check results 
00072 
00073     if (os_) 
00074     {
00075         *os_ << setprecision(10);
00076 
00077         *os_ << "Initial peaks:\n";
00078         copy(peaks.begin(), peaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00079         *os_ << endl;
00080 
00081         *os_ << "Parabola estimated peaks:\n";
00082         copy(estimatedPeaks.begin(), estimatedPeaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00083         *os_ << endl;
00084     }
00085 
00086     unit_assert(estimatedPeaks.size() == 2);
00087 
00088     const Peak& pi0 = estimatedPeaks[0];
00089     unit_assert(pi0.frequency == 0);
00090     unit_assert(pi0.intensity == 3.);
00091 
00092     const Peak& pi1 = estimatedPeaks[1];
00093     unit_assert_equal(pi1.frequency, 7.5, 1e-10);
00094     unit_assert_equal(abs(pi1.intensity-10.), 0., 1e-10);
00095 
00096 
00097     // run Lorentzian estimator
00098 
00099     estimatedPeaks.clear();
00100     fe = FrequencyEstimatorSimple::create(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::Lorentzian);
00101 
00102     for (vector<Peak>::const_iterator it=peaks.begin(); it!=peaks.end(); ++it)
00103         estimatedPeaks.push_back(fe->estimate(fd, *it));
00104 
00105     // check results 
00106 
00107     if (os_)
00108     {
00109         *os_ << "Lorentzian estimated peaks:\n";
00110         copy(estimatedPeaks.begin(), estimatedPeaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00111         *os_ << endl;
00112     }
00113 
00114     unit_assert(estimatedPeaks.size() == 2);
00115 
00116     const Peak& pil0 = estimatedPeaks[0];
00117     unit_assert_equal(pil0.frequency, 0, 1e-10);
00118     unit_assert_equal(abs(pil0.intensity-3.), 0, 1e-10);
00119 
00120     const Peak& pil1 = estimatedPeaks[1];
00121     unit_assert_equal(pil1.frequency, 7.5, 1e-10);
00122     unit_assert(pil1.intensity == 0.); // intensity is nan
00123 }

00126 void testData()
00127 {
00128     if (os_) *os_ << "**************************************************\ntestData()\n";
00129 
00130     FrequencyData fd;
00131     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(28558.59375, complex<double>(25243.032972361, -2820.6360692452)));
00132     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(28559.895833333, complex<double>(39978.141686921, 291.1363106641)));
00133     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(28561.197916667, complex<double>(189200.35822792, -2636.9254689346)));
00134     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(28562.5, complex<double>(-62230.480432624, -2546.1033855971)));
00135     fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(28563.802083333, complex<double>(-32263.08735743, -2769.7946573836)));
00136 
00137     vector<Peak> peaks(1);
00138     peaks[0].frequency = 28561.2;
00139 
00140     if (os_)
00141     {
00142         *os_ << "Initial peaks:\n";
00143         copy(peaks.begin(), peaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00144         *os_ << endl;
00145     }
00146 
00147     vector<Peak> estimatedPeaks;
00148 
00149     auto_ptr<FrequencyEstimatorSimple> 
00150         fe(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::create(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::Parabola));
00151 
00152     for (vector<Peak>::const_iterator it=peaks.begin(); it!=peaks.end(); ++it)
00153         estimatedPeaks.push_back(fe->estimate(fd, *it));
00154 
00155     if (os_)
00156     {
00157         *os_ << setprecision(10);
00158 
00159         *os_ << "Parabola estimated peaks:\n";
00160         copy(estimatedPeaks.begin(), estimatedPeaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00161         *os_ << endl;
00162     }
00163 
00164     unit_assert(estimatedPeaks.size() == 1);
00165     unit_assert_equal(estimatedPeaks[0].frequency, 28561.25049, 1e-5);
00166 }

00204 void testData2_LocalMax()
00205 {
00206     if (os_) *os_ << "**************************************************\ntestData2_LocalMax()\n";
00207 
00208     FrequencyData fd;
00209 
00210     for (const Datum* p=data_; p!=data_+dataSize_; ++p)
00211         fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(p->frequency, p->intensity));
00212 
00213     vector<Peak> peaks(1);
00214     peaks[0].frequency = 10983.74;
00215 
00216     if (os_)
00217     {
00218         *os_ << "Initial peaks:\n";
00219         copy(peaks.begin(), peaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00220         *os_ << endl;
00221     }
00222 
00223     vector<Peak> estimatedPeaks;
00224 
00225     auto_ptr<FrequencyEstimatorSimple> 
00226         fe(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::create(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::LocalMax));
00227 
00228     for (vector<Peak>::const_iterator it=peaks.begin(); it!=peaks.end(); ++it)
00229         estimatedPeaks.push_back(fe->estimate(fd, *it));
00230 
00231     if (os_)
00232     {
00233         *os_ << setprecision(10);
00234 
00235         *os_ << "Local max peaks:\n";
00236         copy(estimatedPeaks.begin(), estimatedPeaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00237         *os_ << endl;
00238     }
00239 
00240     unit_assert(estimatedPeaks.size() == 1);
00241     unit_assert_equal(estimatedPeaks[0].frequency, 10985.02604, 1e-5);
00242 }

00245 void testData2_Parabola()
00246 {
00247     if (os_) *os_ << "**************************************************\ntestData2()\n";
00248 
00249     FrequencyData fd;
00250 
00251     for (const Datum* p=data_; p!=data_+dataSize_; ++p)
00252         fd.data().push_back(FrequencyDatum(p->frequency, p->intensity));
00253

00256 
00257     if (os_)
00258     {
00259         *os_ << "Initial peaks:\n";
00260         copy(peaks.begin(), peaks.end(), ostream_iterator<Peak>(*os_, "\n"));
00261         *os_ << endl;
00262     }
00263 
00264     vector<Peak> estimatedPeaks;
00265

00267         fe(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::create(FrequencyEstimatorSimple::Parabola));
00268 
00269     for (vector<Peak>::const_iterator it=peaks.begin(); it!=peaks.end(); ++it)
00270         estimatedPeaks.push_back(fe->estimate(fd, *it));
00271 
00272     if (os_)

00276         *os_ << "Parabola peaks:\n";

00278         *os_ << endl;
00279     }
00280 
00281     unit_assert(estimatedPeaks.size() == 1);

00286 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00287 {
00288     try
00289     {
00290         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00291         if (os_) *os_ << "FrequencyEstimatorSimpleTest\n";
00292         test();
00293         testData();
00294         testData2_LocalMax();
00295         testData2_Parabola();
00296         return 0;
00297     }
00298     catch (exception& e)
00299     {
00300         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00301         return 1;
00302     }
00303 }
